resultOptionsScreen.downloadInfo: You can now download your new file

Cutter.title: Cutting Tool
Cutter.description: Cut your song to your liking with precision and ease. Customize your favorite tracks by removing unwanted portions and keeping only the best parts. Tailor your music experience to perfection.

Tag Editor.title: Tag Editor
Tag Editor.description: Enhance your music library with the Tag Editor tool. Edit and organize song tags effortlessly. Customize metadata such as artist names, album titles, and genres. Keep your music collection neat and well-organized.

SpeedUp.title: SpeedUp
SpeedUp.description: Accelerate your music with the SpeedUp tool. Increase the tempo of your favorite songs for a faster and more energetic listening experience. Transform your music library with just a few clicks.

Merge.title: Merge
Merge.description: Combine and merge your favorite songs seamlessly with the Merge tool. Create seamless transitions between tracks and craft unique playlists. Blend different musical elements together to compose a harmonious mix.

Converter.title: Converter
Converter.description: Convert your music effortlessly with the Converter tool. Change audio file formats with ease, ensuring compatibility across devices. Enjoy your favorite songs in the format that suits your preferences.

Video to Audio.title: Video to Audio
Video to Audio.description: Extract high-quality audio from videos using the Video to Audio tool. Convert video soundtracks to standalone audio files. Preserve the audio essence of your favorite videos in a format ideal for your music library.

Volume Changer.title: Volume Changer
Volume Changer.description: Take control of your music's dynamics with the Volume Changer tool. Adjust volume levels for individual tracks to create the perfect balance. Fine-tune your audio experience to suit any listening environment.

Recorder.title: Recorder
Recorder.description: Capture the moment with the Recorder tool. Record high-quality audio effortlessly and save your musical ideas on the fly. Whether it's a melody, voice memo, or ambient sound, the Recorder is your versatile audio companion.

LayerMix.title: LayerMix
LayerMix.description: Immerse yourself in creative audio mixing with the LayerMix tool. Combine and layer different audio elements to craft unique soundscapes. Experiment with textures, tones, and rhythms to express your musical vision.

BPM Finder.title: BPM Finder
BPM Finder.description: Discover the beats per minute (BPM) of your songs with the BPM Finder tool. Analyze and understand the tempo of your music for precise mixing and syncing. Unlock the rhythmic secrets of your favorite tracks.

Diagnosis.title: Diagnosis
Diagnosis.description: Diagnose and enhance your audio with the Diagnosis tool. Identify and address audio issues with detailed analysis and diagnostic tools. Elevate the quality of your music by resolving imperfections and optimizing sound.

help.question: Is this website free?
help.answer: Yes, our website is free to use.

help.question: What file formats do you support?
help.answer: We support a variety of file formats; please check our documentation for the complete list.

help.question: Do you have any premium services?
help.answer: Yes, we offer premium services with additional features; explore our subscription plans for more details.

help.question: How much storage do I have?
help.answer: Your storage capacity depends on your subscription plan; refer to your account settings for details.

help.question: Do you support high contrast mode?
help.answer: Yes, our website supports high contrast mode for improved accessibility.

help.question: Do you plan on adding support for more languages?
help.answer: Yes, we are actively working on adding support for additional languages in the near future.

help.question: Do you plan to add new tools?
help.answer: Indeed, we have plans to introduce new tools to enhance user experience; stay tuned for updates.

help.question: How do I save my files?
help.answer: To save your files, use the 'Save' or 'Download' option available in the file menu.

help.question: How much time is the file available for download?
help.answer: The availability of your downloaded file is unlimited unless specified otherwise in your account settings.

help.question: Is this website safe?
help.answer: Yes, we prioritize the security of your data, implementing robust measures to ensure a safe user experience.
